[[inst_clz]]
==== CLZ

*Syntax:* clz SrcL,  M, N, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Count Leading Zeros: counts the number of leading zero bits.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_clz.svg[CLZ encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
